mapper.select: SELECT A.ADT_CODE AS ADT_CODE , A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME , A.RSQ_DATE AS RSQ_DATE , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.SI || ' ' || AD.GU || ' ' || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , CA.CAT_AGE_TYPE AS CAT_AGE_TYPE , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE , A.CAT_REP_IMG AS CAT_IMAGE , A.CAT_ECT1 AS CAT_ECT1 , A.CAT_ECT2 AS CAT_ECT2 , U.ID AS USER_ID , U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , U.TEL AS USER_TEL , U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN USER_REG U ON A.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_CAT_AGE CA ON A.CAT_AGE_CODE = CA.CAT_AGE_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE ORDER BY A.POST_DATE

SELECT A.ADT_CODE AS ADT_CODE , A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME , A.RSQ_DATE AS RSQ_DATE , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.SI || ' ' || AD.GU || ' ' || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , CA.CAT_AGE_TYPE AS CAT_AGE_TYPE , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE , A.CAT_REP_IMG AS CAT_IMAGE , A.CAT_ECT1 AS CAT_ECT1 , A.CAT_ECT2 AS CAT_ECT2 , U.ID AS USER_ID , U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , U.TEL AS USER_TEL , U.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN USER_REG U ON A.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE LEFT JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_CAT_AGE CA ON A.CAT_AGE_CODE = CA.CAT_AGE_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE LEFT JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE WHERE AD.GU = #{searchGu} AND AD.DONG = #{searchDong} ORDER BY A.POST_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS dataCount FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE WHERE AD.GU = #{searchGu} AND AD.DONG = #{searchDong}

SELECT A.ADT_CODE AS ADT_CODE , A.CAT_NAME AS CAT_NAME , U.NICKNAME AS USER_NICKNAME , A.RSQ_DATE AS RSQ_DATE , CT.SPECIES AS CAT_TYPE , CT.SPECIES_CODE AS CAT_TYPE_CODE , CS.SEX_CODE AS SEX_CODE , CS.SEX AS CAT_SEX , A.CAT_AGE AS CAT_AGE , AD.GU AS GU , AD.DONG AS DONG , AD.SI || ' ' || AD.GU || ' ' || AD.DONG AS CAT_ADDRESS , CA.CAT_AGE_CODE AS CAT_AGE_CODE , CA.CAT_AGE_TYPE AS CAT_AGE_TYPE , AP.ADT_PROC AS ADT_PROC , A.ADT_PROC_CODE AS ADT_PROC_CODE , A.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE_CODE , AT.ADT_TYPE AS ADT_TYPE , A.HIT_COUNT AS HITCOUNT , A.POST_DATE AS POST_DATE , A.CAT_REP_IMG AS CAT_IMAGE , A.CAT_ECT1 AS CAT_ECT1 , A.CAT_ECT2 AS CAT_ECT2 , U.ID AS USER_ID , U.USER_NAME AS USER_NAME , A.TEL AS USER_TEL , A.EMAIL AS USER_EMAIL , A.ADT_REASON AS ADT_REASON , A.HIT_COUNT AS HIT_COUNT , A.ADT_CAT_EXP AS CAT_EXP , A.ADT_JOB AS JOB , A.ADT_MARRIAGE AS MARRIAGE , A.ADT_FAMILY_NUM AS FAMILY_NUM FROM ADT_REG A LEFT JOIN USER_REG U ON A.USER_CODE = U.USER_CODE JOIN CAT_TYPE CT ON A.CAT_SPECIES = CT.SPECIES_CODE JOIN CAT_SEX CS ON A.CAT_SEX = CS.SEX_CODE JOIN ADDRESS AD ON A.CAT_ADDRESS = AD.ADDRESS_CODE JOIN ADT_CAT_AGE CA ON A.CAT_AGE_CODE = CA.CAT_AGE_CODE JOIN ADT_PROCESS AP ON A.ADT_PROC_CODE = AP.ADT_PROC_CODE JOIN ADT_TYPE AT ON A.ADT_TYPE = AT.ADT_TYPE_CODE WHERE ADT_CODE = #{adt_code}
SELECT DISTINCT GU AS GU FROM ADDRESS ORDER BY GU ASC
SELECT DONG FROM ADDRESS WHERE GU=#{selectedGu,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY DONG ASC
